```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(metill)
library(patchwork)
theme_set(theme_metill())


```


```{r}
heildar_hlutar <- 450

d <- tribble(
  ~verd, ~innlend, ~erlend,
  110, 106, 31,
  111, 106, 28,
  112, 106, 28,
  113, 107, 28,
  114, 106, 27,
  115, 106, 26,
  116, 103, 10,
  117, 103, 10,
  118, 100, 8,
  119, 76, 8,
  120, 75, 8,
  121, 61, 8,
  122, 61, 8,
  123, 23, 0,
  124, 9, 0,
  125, 6, 0
) |> 
  mutate_at(
    vars(innlend, erlend),
    function(x) pmax(x - lead(x, default = 0), 0)
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    samtals = innlend + erlend,
    hlutar = samtals * 1e9 / verd,
    hlutar = hlutar / 1e6,
    hlutf = hlutar / heildar_hlutar
  )

plot_dat <- d |> 
  select(verd, Innlend = innlend, Erlend = erlend) |> 
  pivot_longer(c(-verd)) |> 
  mutate(value = value * 1e9,
         hlutar = value / verd / 1e6,
         hlutf = hlutar / heildar_hlutar) |> 
  group_by(verd) |> 
  mutate(samtals = sum(value)) |> 
  ungroup()


p1 <- d |> 
  select(verd, Innlend = innlend, Erlend = erlend) |> 
  pivot_longer(c(-verd)) |> 
  mutate(value = value * 1e9,
         hlutar = value / verd / 1e6,
         hlutf = hlutar / heildar_hlutar) |> 
  ggplot(aes(verd, value)) +
  geom_col(
    aes(fill = name, col = name), 
    position = "stack", 
    width = 1, 
    alpha = 0.9
  ) +
  # geom_hline(
  #   yintercept = 1,
  #   lty = 2,
  #   alpha = 0.6
  # ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    expand = expansion(),
    breaks = 110:125,
    labels = label_isk()
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    expand = expansion(),
    labels = label_isk(accuracy = 1, scale = 1e-9),
    breaks = c(range(plot_dat$samtals), 1e10 * 1:4)
  ) +
  scale_colour_brewer(type = "qual", palette = "Set1") +
  scale_fill_brewer(type = "qual", palette = "Set1") +
  guides(
    fill = guide_legend(
      title.position = "top"
    ),
    colour = guide_legend(
      title.position = "top"
    )
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = c(0.122, 0.88),
    legend.direction = "horizontal",
    legend.title = element_text(colour = "#252525", size = 13)
  ) +
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = NULL,
    fill = "Tegund tilboða",
    col = "Tegund tilboða",
    subtitle = "Heildarverð eignarhluta sem voru gefin tilboð í eftir söluverði"
  )

plot_dat <- d |> 
  select(verd, Innlend = innlend, Erlend = erlend) |> 
  pivot_longer(c(-verd)) |> 
  mutate(value = value * 1e9,
         hlutar = value / verd / 1e6,
         hlutf = hlutar / heildar_hlutar) |> 
  group_by(verd) |> 
  mutate(samtals = sum(hlutar)) |> 
  ungroup()

p2 <- plot_dat |> 
  ggplot(aes(verd, hlutar)) +
  geom_vline(
    xintercept = 117,
    lty = 2,
    alpha = 0.4
  ) +
  annotate(
    x = 117.2, 
    y = 320, 
    label = "Endanlegt söluverð",
    geom = "text",
    hjust = 0,
    alpha = 0.6
    ) +
  geom_col(
    aes(fill = name, col = name), 
    position = "stack", 
    width = 1, 
    alpha = 0.9
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    expand = expansion(),
    breaks = 110:125,
    labels = label_isk()
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    expand = expansion(),
    labels = label_number(),
    breaks = tufte_breaks(plot_dat$samtals),
    sec.axis = sec_axis(trans = ~ . / 450, labels = label_hlutf(), breaks = tufte_breaks(plot_dat$samtals / 450))
  ) +
  scale_colour_brewer(type = "qual", palette = "Set1") +
  scale_fill_brewer(type = "qual", palette = "Set1") +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none"
  ) +
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = NULL,
    fill = NULL,
    col = NULL,
    subtitle = "Fjöldi eignarhluta sem var eftirspurn eftir (v. ás) og hlutfall þeirra af sölumagni (h.ás)"
  )



p <- p1 / p2 +
  # plot_layout(guides = "collect") +
  plot_annotation(
    title = "Dreifing kauptilboða í Íslandsbankasölunni",
    caption = "Byggt á mynd 3.3 úr skýrslu Ríkisendurskoðunar\nhttps://www.rikisend.is/reskjol/files/Skyrslur/2022-Islandsbanki-sala.pdf"
  )


ggsave(
  plot = p,
  filename = "Figures/isb_dreifing.png",
  width = 8, height = 0.7 * 8, scale = 1.3
)
```
